abstract: Starbucks says failure in its in-store payment systems at 8,000 stores operated by company in North America stemmed from issue with daily computer system update.
lead_paragraph: In-store payment systems at Starbucks stores went down Friday across the United States and Canada.

headline.main: System Crash for Starbucks Leads to Free Coffee for Some
headline.print_headline: System Crash for Starbucks Leads to Free Coffee for Some

snippet: In-store payment systems at Starbucks stores went down Friday across the United States and Canada.
